name: Big Panda
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Big Panda is a Panda theme meme coin designed to offer the benefits that other meme coins don’t give to its community. It offers blockchain gaming and entertaining NFTs based on Binance Smart Chain, developing a decentralized community and ecosystem. The only meme coin capable to blow its competition away and walk over.
Big Panda aims to be No.1 community token allowing degens to rely and invest freely. The ultimate goal is to soak up the liquidity from the competitors.
Our mission is to utilize Web3 technology to create entertaining and highly engaging applications that push the boundaries of traditional gaming and the metaverse.
